record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2334, S. 2340, S. 2346, S. 2348, and H.R. 3996
record.narrative:
MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2334, S. 2340, S. 2346, S. 2348, and H.R. 3996 -- (Senate - November 14, 2007)

[Page: S14353]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there are five bills at the desk due for their second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the titles of the bills, en bloc.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

A bill (S. 2334) to withhold 10 percent of the Federal funding apportioned for highway construction and maintenance from States that issue driver's licenses to individuals without verifying the legal status of such individuals.
A bill (S. 2340) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

A bill (S. 2346) to temporarily increase the portfolio caps applicable to Freddie Mac and Fannie Mae, to provide the necessary financing to curb foreclosures by facilitating the refinancing of at-risk subprime borrowers into safe, affordable loans, and for other purposes.
A bill (S. 2348) to ensure control over the United States border and to strengthen enforcement of the immigration laws.
A bill (H.R. 3996) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with regard to these bills en bloc.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be placed on the calendar.
